mapper.select:
select ${columnItem} from ( select c.PolicyNo,c.PolicyType,pn.PolicyTypeName,c.AccDocNo,c.TBSubmitDate,c.CaseReceviceDate,c.PolicyActiveDate,c.PrintDate, c.AgentCode,(select br.BrokerName from underwriting.dbo.BrokerProfile br where br.Broker_ID = c.AgentCode) AS BrokerName ,c.BranchCode, (select distinct nk.NEBK_Branch_Name from underwriting.dbo.NBUDWLINEBK nk where nk.NEBK_Branch_Code = c.BranchCode) AS NEBK_Branch_Name, c.AgentSalesID,c.AgentSalesName,(CASE c.AccUnit WHEN '01' THEN '總公司' WHEN '02' THEN '高雄分公司' WHEN '03' THEN '台中分公司' WHEN '04' THEN '花蓮分公司' WHEN '05' THEN '桃園分公司' WHEN '06' THEN '台南分公司' WHEN '07' THEN '新竹分公司' WHEN '08' THEN '嘉義分公司' WHEN '09' THEN '台北分公司' ELSE '' END)as AccUnit, (select ur.UserName from underwriting.dbo.UserProfile ur where ur.User_ID = c.Manager) AS UserName, (CASE c.BPMCurrentTak WHEN '150000P' THEN '受理' WHEN '200000S' THEN '收件通報' WHEN '230000S' THEN '待掃描' WHEN '250000P' THEN '品管' WHEN '300000P' THEN '登打流程' WHEN '300500P' THEN '一登(自行取件)' WHEN '300500S' THEN '人員取件' WHEN '301000S' THEN '登打分件標籤 ' WHEN '301500P' THEN '一登(系統派件)' WHEN '302000P' THEN '二登' WHEN '302500P' THEN '二校' WHEN '303000P' THEN '三校' WHEN '350500S' THEN '財務核保' WHEN '351000S' THEN '黑名單即時查詢 ' WHEN '351500S' THEN '核心資料準備' WHEN '352000S' THEN '體檢註記' WHEN '400000S' THEN '核保分派' WHEN '450000S' THEN '自動核保' WHEN '500000P' THEN '核保承辦' WHEN '500500P' THEN '核保作業 ' WHEN '501011P' THEN '照會覆核' WHEN '501012P' THEN '照會核定 ' WHEN '501500P' THEN '醫師會簽' WHEN '502000P' THEN '會簽結果登錄' WHEN '550500P' THEN '核保人員覆核 ' WHEN '550505P' THEN '科長覆核' WHEN '550510P' THEN '副理覆核' WHEN '550515P' THEN '經理覆核' WHEN '550520P' THEN '高階覆核' WHEN '551012P' THEN '照會核定' WHEN '600500P' THEN '繳費核印作業' WHEN '601500S' THEN '核心系統資料更新' WHEN '602000S' THEN '出單日更新' WHEN '602500S' THEN '案件結案' ELSE '' END) AS BPMCurrentTak, (CASE (SELECT TOP (1) prl.ReviewResult FROM underwriting.dbo.PolicyReviewLog prl where prl.Main_Key = (select Main_Key from underwriting.dbo.MainPolicy where PolicyNo = c.PolicyNo) and prl.LogType = 'B' and prl.Sub_Serial = '0' order by prl.ReviewTimes desc, prl.ReviewType desc) WHEN 'A1' THEN '核保通過' WHEN 'C1' THEN '退保(撤銷要保)' WHEN 'D1' THEN '延保' WHEN 'N1' THEN '退保(照會逾期退件)' WHEN 'N2' THEN '批註說明' WHEN 'R1' THEN '拒保' WHEN '5' THEN '承保' WHEN '9' THEN '不予承保' ELSE '' END) AS ReviewResult, c.AppName,c.AppID,c.AppCountry,c.AppPolicyAge, c.InsName,c.InsID,c.LIPI_AGE AS lipiAge, c.PolicyAmountNTD,c.PolicyFee, (CASE c.PayType WHEN 'A' THEN '年繳' WHEN 'F' THEN '彈性繳' WHEN 'M' THEN '月繳' WHEN 'Q' THEN '季繳' WHEN 'S' THEN '半年繳' WHEN 'T' THEN '躉繳' ELSE '' END) AS PayType, c.PermYear,pn.NoteDate,pn.DueDate,pni.ItemContent,pni.ContentMemo from underwriting.dbo.MainPolicy c left join underwriting.dbo.PolicyNote pn on c.Main_Key = pn.Main_Key left join underwriting.dbo.PolicyNoteItems pni on pn.Note_Key = pni.Note_Key
AND UPPER( c.AppName) LIKE N'%${vo.appName}%'
AND c.AppID = '${vo.appID}'
AND CONVERT(DATETIME,c.TBSubmitDate,120) >= '${vo.tBStartTime}'
AND CONVERT(DATETIME,c.TBSubmitDate,120) <= '${vo.tBEndTime}'
AND CONVERT(DATETIME,c.PolicyActiveDate,120) >= '${vo.policyActiveStartTime}'
AND CONVERT(DATETIME,c.PolicyActiveDate,120) <= '${vo.policyActiveEndTime}'
AND c.BPMCurrentTak = '${vo.bpmcurrenttak}'
AND c.PolicyNo = '${vo.policyNo}'
AND c.PSalesCode = '${vo.pSalesCode}'
AND c.AgentCode = '869' AND c.AgentBranchM = '00'
AND c.AgentCode = = '869' AND c.AgentBranchM = '01'
AND c.AgentCode = '${vo.agentCode}'
AND c.BranchCode = '${vo.branchCode}'
AND pn.NoteStatus = '${vo.noteStatus}'
AND pn.NoteVerifyResult = '${vo.noteVerifyResult}'
AND c.PolicyType = '${vo.policyType}'
AND UPPER( c.InsName) LIKE N'%${vo.insName}%'
AND c.InsID = '${vo.insID}'
)ff group by ${columnItem}

SELECT pt.PType_Code,pt.PTypeName FROM underwriting.dbo.MainPolicy c left join underwriting.dbo.PolicyType pt on c.PolicyType = pt.PType_Code where pt.PType_Code IS NOT NULL and pt.PTypeName IS NOT NULL group by pt.PType_Code,pt.PTypeName
